    • Constructor Detail

      • LISSSocket

        public LISSSocket(java.net.Socket sock,
                  LISSStationServer srv,
                  int next,
                  java.lang.String tg,
                  EdgeThread pr)
        Creates a new instance of LISSSocket
        Parameters:
        sock - A socket this thread will use for communication (a LISSS client
        srv - The LISSStationServer which will contain data for this station
        next - The nextout value to ring queue (last packet that was put in)
        tg - The tag to hang on this thread
        pr - The parent thread to use for logging
